item.title: Need help with vote popup on website - rep++
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

If you make it popup every page load, I’d either

A) Disable javascript on my browser, rendering your script useless, or much more likely
B) Stop going to your site because that would be annoying as fuck.

In any case, it seems there’s code missing, as that doesn’t show the full workings of the script.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with vote popup on website - rep++

item.title: Need help with vote popup on website - rep++
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

Hey im not sure if this is the right section for this, sorry if it isnt, im new to html and all that website coding, i have a vote popup reminding my players on my server to vote and it seems to have a timer or something, it only shows up first visit, its been about 15 hours and it hasnt showed up again.
heres a small code, what i want to know is how can i make it show up every time the page loads (home page)
Any help is really appreciated!!

function createCookie(name,value,min) { if (min) { var date = new Date(); date.setTime(date.getTime()+(min*60*1000)); var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString(); } else var expires = ""; document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/"; }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with vote popup on website - rep++
